activities: Propel-ant  Inc. provides marketing and communication services.  Personal information may be collected by it from customers to provide personalized and relevant marketing and communications materials.  Propel-ant Inc. also collects personal information for purposes of human resource management and planning.  No personal information is collected by Propel-ant Inc. unless it is provided voluntarily.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Education & Training - (EDS)Employment Services - (EMP)Information Services - (INF)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)
personaldata: Client data collected includes a contact person’s name, company name, and  email address for contact person.  Employees and potential employee data is also collected for human resources planning and management purposes.  All personal information collected is voluntarily provided by the individual and manually processed by Propel-ant Inc.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commission
